results.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
results.overview: Several years after the demise of Jurassic World, a volcanic eruption threatens the remaining dinosaurs on the island of Isla Nublar. Claire Dearing, the former park manager and founder of the Dinosaur Protection Group, recruits Owen Grady to help prevent the extinction of the dinosaurs once again.

results.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
results.overview: As Scott Lang awaits expiration of his term of house detention, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym involve him in a scheme to rescue Mrs. van Dyne from the micro-universe into which she has fallen, while two groups of schemers converge on them with intentions of stealing Dr. Pym's inventions.

results.title: Incredibles 2
results.overview: Elastigirl springs into action to save the day, while Mr. Incredible faces his greatest challenge yet – taking care of the problems of his three children.

results.title: The First Purge
results.overview: To push the crime rate below one percent for the rest of the year, the New Founding Fathers of America test a sociological theory that vents aggression for one night in one isolated community. But when the violence of oppressors meets the rage of the others, the contagion will explode from the trial-city borders and spread across the nation.

results.title: A Quiet Place
results.overview: A family is forced to live in silence while hiding from creatures that hunt by sound.

results.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: Summer Vacation
results.overview: Dracula, Mavis, Johnny and the rest of the Drac Pack take a vacation on a luxury Monster Cruise Ship, where Dracula falls in love with the ship's captain, Ericka, who's secretly a descendant of Abraham Van Helsing, the notorious monster slayer.

results.title: Overboard
results.overview: A spoiled, wealthy yacht owner is thrown overboard and becomes the target of revenge from his mistreated employee. A remake of the 1987 comedy.

results.title: Detective Conan: Zero the Enforcer
results.original_title: 名探偵コナン ゼロの執行人
results.overview: There is a sudden explosion at Tokyo Summit's giant Edge of Ocean facility. The shadow of Tōru Amuro, who works for the National Police Agency Security Bureau as Zero, appears at the site. In addition, the "triple-face" character is known as Rei Furuya as a detective and Kogorō Mōri's apprentice, and he is also known as Bourbon as a Black Organization member. Kogorō is arrested as a suspect in the case of the explosion. Conan conducts an investigation to prove Kogorō's innocence, but Amuro gets in his way.

results.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
results.original_title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
results.overview: On the Greek island of Kalokairi, the daughter of Donna Sheridan, Sophie, finds out more about her mother's past while seeking guidance on how to handle her pregnancy.

results.title: The Equalizer 2
results.overview: Robert McCall returns to deliver his special brand of vigilante justice -- but how far will he go when it's someone he loves?

results.title: Skyscraper
results.overview: Framed and on the run, a former FBI agent must save his family from a blazing fire in the world's tallest building.

results.title: 12 Strong
results.overview: A team of CIA agents and special forces head into Afghanistan in the aftermath of the September 11th attacks in an attempt to dismantle the Taliban.

results.title: Truth or Dare
results.overview: A harmless game of "Truth or Dare" among friends turns deadly when someone—or something—begins to punish those who tell a lie—or refuse the dare.

results.title: Maquia: When the Promised Flower Blooms
results.original_title: さよならの朝に約束の花をかざろう
results.overview: A story of encounters and partings interwoven between people; this is a human drama with feelings that touch one's heart gradually, which everyone has experienced at least once.

results.title: Love, Simon
results.overview: Everyone deserves a great love story. But for seventeen-year old Simon Spier it's a little more complicated: he's yet to tell his family or friends he's gay and he doesn't know the identity of the anonymous classmate he's fallen for online.

results.title: Unfriended: Dark Web
results.overview: ​When a 20-something finds a cache of hidden files on his new laptop, he and his friends are unwittingly thrust into the depths of the dark web.  They soon discover someone has been watching their every move and will go to unimaginable lengths to protect the dark web.

results.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
results.overview: Through a series of daring escapades deep within a dark and dangerous criminal underworld, Han Solo meets his mighty future copilot Chewbacca and encounters the notorious gambler Lando Calrissian.

results.title: Unsane
results.overview: A woman is involuntarily committed to a mental institution where she is confronted by her greatest fear.

results.title: Isle of Dogs
results.overview: In the future, an outbreak of canine flu leads the mayor of a Japanese city to banish all dogs to an island that's a garbage dump. The outcasts must soon embark on an epic journey when a 12-year-old boy arrives on the island to find his beloved pet.

results.title: I Kill Giants
results.overview: Sophia, a new high school student, tries to make friends with Barbara, who tells her that “she kills giants,” protecting this way her hometown and its inhabitants, who do not understand her strange behavior.
